authors: Matt Zaldivar, Thanks to Brian Shields and Benjamin Bandelow, I used their Exalted sheet as a starting point. Zachary 'RinVindor' Ball doing the update, used Havoc's custom sheet but removed API fuctionality for free users.
instructions: # Vampire: The Masquerade Character Sheet For use in the classic World of Darkness, 20th Anniversary edition.  Designed to function much like an actual paper sheet would. You just fill out the dots and ratings for your character, then you can go to the Dice section to make the roll you need for most actions.
